title: What Josh Shapiro Believes
description: The Pennsylvania governor has spent his life preparing to lead an America that might no longer exist.
content: It is a rare thing to see Josh Shapiro sweat. For all the grief the Pennsylvania governor gets for imitating Barack Obama—the staggered cadence, the side-of-the-mouth delivery for effect—their essent… [+48939 chars]
